titles.title: Armenia Free Trade Act
A bill to promote peace and prosperity, and open market economic development in Armenia, through the establishment of a free trade agreement between the United States and the Republic of Armenia.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 8/3/1993--Introduced. Armenia Free Trade Act - Directs the President to initiate negotiations for a trade agreement establishing a free trade area between the Republic of Armenia and the United States. Declares "fast track" procedures under the Trade Act of 1974 to apply to such agreement until January 1, 1999.
